name: connect-four
description: ![icon](client/public/faviconTemplate.svg) # Connect Four An implementation of the game Connect Four. Features include an AI to play against and online multiplayer so you can play with your friends. The game uses React and Redux on the client and Socket.IO on the server. ## Live site: https://vouga-connect-four.herokuapp.com/ ![](preview.gif)

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && yarn dev" "cd client && yarn start" "cd client && PORT=3001 yarn start"
